TopicTitle: Mod for changing part orientation - space station

Articles.Content:
Hello, so, after spending a few hours and having a nice and beautiful space station, I realized I had put my only docking port sr. upside down.

 

Any hope changing it using mod or anything?

https://pasteboard.co/Hf8cYEp.png

The docking port sr. is back there in the shadow. It showed up after I ejected the lt909engine

Any help appreciated.

 

Thanks
KIS might be able to do this with an EVA.  At the very least, you can send up another port, remove the first, see if you can re attach it in the correct orientation, if not, attach the new one.

7 hours ago, Gargamel said:

KIS might be able to do this with an EVA.  At the very least, you can send up another port, remove the first, see if you can re attach it in the correct orientation, if not, attach the new one. 

Sorry for the ignorance, but yesterday I realized I could remove the docking port. It floated around but I couldn't realize how can I attach it back in the correct orientation.

If I send another port up, I must attach it with the "non-docking" side inwards, while the port itself stays out. How do I do that, will it attach itself only by getting close to the ship? Do I need KIS either way?

Thank you so far by the way

Edited April 6, 2018 by smokedfx
thanks

14 hours ago, Gargamel said:

KIS might be able to do this with an EVA.  At the very least, you can send up another port, remove the first, see if you can re attach it in the correct orientation, if not, attach the new one. 

Nevermind, just did it. Worked perfectly. Thank you so much!!
